dialogueLines.line: That blue-haired midget...who does he think he is?
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Does he think he can make my daughter happy?
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: He can't even put a hat on properly.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: If only I could find where he took my daughter, then I could show him his place.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: [Looking to show off your rap skills? Come on down to Carmen Dare, a grand once-in-a-lifetime rap battle tournament! Impress the judges and you could win a hefty cash prize of $75,000. The tournament takes place today at the address below. Don't miss out!]
Meh, just $75,000? I make that much in the blink of an eye.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Wait, if it's a rap battle...
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Then HE will be there too...
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Well, it looks like I've got some work to do.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad
